creator: mm@arcus.com.au
text:
The code for TIFF image handling is missing .close() statements for some of the 
streams opened. The can lead to "out of file handle" problems especially in  
environments where fop is embedded in server type applications.

This patch is against 0.20.5. If the same source is used for 1.0 then the patch 
should be applied there too.

creator: glenmazza@yahoo.com
text:
This patch looks reversed--the -'s are where the +'s should be, and vice-versa, 
I think.  Probably best to redo the patch and re-submit.

Thanks,
Glen

creator: mm@arcus.com.au
text:
Created attachment 8937
Diff file with the arguments reversed 'diff -u <old file> <new file>' - hope I got it right this time

This problem doesn't exist in FOP 0.93 anymore. The code looks clean (TIFFImage
and JAIImage).
creator: jeremias@apache.org
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
